sanskrit_verse:
ऋणानि त्रीण्यपाकृत्य मनो मोक्षे निवेशयेत् ।
अनपाकृत्य मोक्षं तु सेवमानो व्रजत्यधः ॥ ६.३५॥
transliteration:
ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet |
anapākṛtya mokṣaṃ tu sevamāno vrajatyadhaḥ || 6.35||
sph_interpretive_translation: One must fully discharge the three debts—to the sages, ancestors, and deities—before directing the mind toward liberation; one who seeks liberation without clearing these debts descends downward.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority: The seeker bears a structural obligation to fulfill relational debts prior to spiritual ascent.
Causation: Unresolved obligations generate karmic inertia that obstructs liberation.
Capacity-based responsibility: Spiritual eligibility depends on completion of foundational duties.
Restoration logic: Liberation is contingent upon alignment with cosmic and social order.
Consciousness alignment: True freedom arises only after harmonizing individual will with universal dharma.
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent_has_unsettled_debts(Ṛṣi, Pitṝn, Devatā) THEN agent_is_ineligible_for_mokṣa_sadhana()
supreme_court_application: In adjudicating matters involving claims of spiritual attainment or renunciatory status, courts must verify fulfillment of foundational dharmic obligations. Legal recognition of liberation-based rights requires validation of debt-clearance as per scriptural law.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that unfulfilled obligations inherently impede consciousness expansion. Anupūrvaśaḥ demonstrates sequential dependency: social harmony precedes spiritual ascent. Responsibility is proportional to one's relational capacity. Non-punitive enforcement restores eligibility rather than imposing penalty.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Debt_completion_process: Initiate systematic resolution of outstanding obligations to Ṛṣis, Pitṝn, and Devatās.
Consciousness_reintegration: Realign seeker’s intent with dharmic structure through guided ritual and restitution.
Capacity_restoration: Enable conditions for fulfillment through community support and scriptural guidance.
Integrity_reintegration: Confirm alignment between declared spiritual status and dharmic conduct.
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law is established: Liberation is preceded by duty. Reality is non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates truth. Dharma is restored.
